title: React Component Assignment
description: Build and submit a React component using functional components and props.

title: State Management in React
description: Implement state management using useState and useEffect hooks.

title: Building a Todo Website
description: Develop a fully functional Todo App using React and local state.

title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Analyze different types of rocket propulsion systems and their efficiency.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Study the combustion process in rocket engines and calculate efficiency.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design and analyze the efficiency of rocket engine nozzles.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Evaluate concepts of lift, drag, and airflow around aircraft structures.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Use computational fluid dynamics to analyze airflows over a wing.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Study aerodynamic heating and develop heat-resistant materials for aircraft.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a spacecraft structure considering weight, stress, and load distribution.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate orbital mechanics, including transfer orbits and velocity changes.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Evaluate the integration of spacecraft subsystems and mission planning strategies.

title: HTML & CSS Styling Exercise
description: Apply styling to a webpage using CSS selectors, Flexbox, and Grid.

title: Flexbox & Grid Layouts
description: Create a responsive webpage layout using CSS Flexbox and Grid.

title: Responsive Web Design Project
description: Design a fully responsive webpage using media queries and modern CSS.

title: JavaScript Functions and Scope
description: Write JavaScript functions to demonstrate lexical scope and closures.

title: Event Handling in JavaScript
description: Implement event listeners and handlers in a JavaScript project.

title: Asynchronous JavaScript
description: Work with JavaScript promises, async/await, and the Fetch API.

title: Node.js Server Setup
description: Set up a basic Node.js server with Express and configure routing.

title: Express.js Routing
description: Define routes using Express.js and handle middleware.

title: Building REST APIs with Node.js
description: Create and document RESTful APIs using Express and MongoDB.

title: Session Storage and Cookies
description: Implement authentication session storage using cookies and Express sessions.

title: JWT Authentication
description: Secure an application using JWT authentication and token-based access.

title: OAuth Implementation
description: Integrate OAuth for third-party authentication in a web app.

title: Understanding REST APIs
description: Learn how to design and document RESTful APIs using OpenAPI.

title: Consuming APIs in Frontend
description: Fetch and display API data in a frontend application.

title: GraphQL vs REST Comparison
description: Compare GraphQL and REST APIs, including pros and cons.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: Learn fundamental machine learning concepts and training models.

title: Neural Networks Basics
description: Understand the architecture and training process of neural networks.

title: AI Ethics and Bias
description: Discuss the ethical implications and bias in AI models.

title: Cybersecurity Threats and Prevention
description: Explore different cybersecurity threats and best practices for prevention.

title: Network Security Practices
description: Learn about firewalls, intrusion detection, and secure networking.

title: Introduction to Ethical Hacking
description: Understand penetration testing and ethical hacking fundamentals.
